titles.title: To amend the Community Services Block Grant Act with respect to the composition of the boards of community action agencies, and of nonprofit private organizations, that receive funds under such Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Youth and Families.

committee.name: House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities

bill.summary: 9/27/1996--Introduced. Amends the Community Services Block Grant Act to make certain community action agency and nonprofit private organization board composition requirements discretionary.
